author: Jacob Dressler
description:
A surprising Marvel Cinematic Universe flop has managed to make a comeback on streaming. The long-running franchise is mostly defined by its theatrical successes, and while there are plenty to count, there has also been the occasional flop. Surprisingly, however, this flop has proven to be a hit with audiences – just outside of the [...]

The post One Of Marvel’s MCU Flops Makes Comeback On Streaming appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: One Of Marvel’s MCU Flops Makes Comeback On Streaming

author: Jacob Dressler
description:
Actor Tom Holland was working on the new MCU Spider-Man movie Spider-Man: Brand New Day when he suffered a brutal injury. Now the beloved actor was reported to have been hospitalized as a result while shooting took place in Glasgow. As shared via Deadline, “filming was suspended Friday as the actor was treated for a [...]

The post Tom Holland Rushed To Hospital After Brutal Injury Filming ‘Spider-Man: Brand New Day’ appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Tom Holland Rushed To Hospital After Brutal Injury Filming ‘Spider-Man: Brand New Day’
